name: Dot Clicker
description:
30 seconds to rack up points. How many can you get?
Click the dots once, twice or three times to make it disappear.

After putting of learning Unity for a long time, decided to bite the bullet and finally step in. Explored the basics of 3D and 2D game development in the limited time I had.

Created for the Black & White jam. 

Assets

Classic game objects sfx by Mudya
